title: Halley
creator_credit: York Films of England and Terence Murtagh
brief_description: Provides a historical look at Halley’s Comet; considers work of Halley; notes popularity of comet watching in eighteenth and nineteenth century and briefly shows how NASA space vehicle “Giotto” will rendezvous with Halley’s comet in 1986.
